item.title: Void help
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

now when i log in it has the rules menu. and its blinking.
but i wanted it to show up when i type ::rules
and i cant move?
so i changed back to what i had before.(so i could move)

this is what i put in boolean process:

[code] public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
rulesMenu();
writePlayers();

	if (actionAmount < 0) {
		actionAmount = 0;
	}
	if (actionTimer > 0) {
		actionTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (actionAmount > 25) {
		sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!");
		misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it");
		disconnected = true;
	}
	if (theifTimer > 0) {
		theifTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (AgilityTimer > 0) {
		AgilityTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (WCTimer > 0) {
		WCTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (RCTimer > 0) {
		RCTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (healTimer > 0) {
		healTimer -= 1;
	}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 12:57:12 PM[/size][hr]come on plz help me

srry for double posting but i need this

Read full topic

item.title: Void help
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Change the rulesmenu to rulesMenu so it has capital M (change it in void and also in the command) then search for public boolean process and right under it put rulesMenu();

Read full topic

item.title: Void help
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Make it rulesMenu and add rulesMenu(); under public boolean process.

item.description:

when i type ::rules nothing comes up?

heres my void:

[code]public void rulesmenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@RULES", 8144);  //Title

				sendQuest("@red@10-No ::noclip automatic ban	", 8156);									sendQuest("@red@11-join server forums @ http://pkservers.21.forumer.com", 8157);

}[/code]

and heres my command:

}[/code]

can all you coders out there help me
please?
